name: I became a Treasure Hunter to Pay Off My Student Debt, but now an Immortal Snail is Coming after me with a Knife
name_original: I became a Treasure Hunter to Pay Off My Student Debt, but now an Immortal Snail is Coming after me with a Knife
description:
WARNING: The game takes a bit of time to load in. (Might have to refresh the page if it crashes like once)

A game made in Godot for the 2022 Coding Blocks Game Jam.

Your goal is to collect enough money to pay off your student debts while an immortal snail chases you. As you collect more money though, the snail will get infuriated and speed up.

Controls:

Arrow Keys = Move

Space = Deploy Obstructions(Obstructions slows down the Snail when they run through)

Hold Tab = Show Minimap

Game By: Xenvex(Me) and Kevin Huang

Sounds:

https://freesound.org/people/DrMinky/sounds/166187/ https://freesound.org/people/sinatra314/sounds/58453/ https://freesound.org/people/magnuswaker/sounds/540092/ https://freesound.org/people/bulbastre/sounds/189287/
